Because of the paucity of literature available on the timing of baseline blood work before initiation of anticancer agents, the choice of accepted intervals between blood work and chemotherapy is ill defined 41. The HCWs can consider drawing blood work at expanded safe intervals to minimize the patient's visits to medical facilities.
